introduction: A film by Guillaume Dero。大友良英与New Jazz Ensemble 現場與及個人turntable solo噪音表演與吉他獨奏。中间穿插大友良英的访谈。Music(s) [A film by Guillaume Dero] (total time 49:42)1.Orange Was the Color of Her Dress--Tails Out (Charles Mingus--Otomo Yoshihide)2.Turntable (Otomo Yoshihide)3.Hat & Beard (Eric Dolphy)4.Theme from Canary (Otomo Yoshihide)5.Eureka (Jim O'Rourke)Cinematography by Philippe CoutantSound recording by SextanEditing by Guillaume DeroSound mix by Jean-Marc SchickCamera by Gilles Le Mao, Romain Pierrat, Christophe Michelet, Florian Bouchet, and Laurent PerrotDVD Authoring by Adrien TrousselProduced by Stephane Jourdain
